Klasse AppWindow

java.lang.Object
org.oxt.toolbox.gui.AppWindow
public class AppWindow extends Object
Main class of OpenXRechnungToolbox. Builds the main GUI window.
Version:
3.0.0
Autor:
Dr. Jan C. Thiele
